text: haey nowpel ai sa ban neamk nouv phosdo tang yeang chbasa leasa cheachraen( mokkan ambaur aisreael) keat kaban pol tha chea karpit nasa khnhom ban neamk aoy puok anak nouv hi k meat( pheap chea na pi) ning daembi aoy khnhom banhcheak brab puok anak nouv rueng muoychamnuon del puok anak kampoung khvengkoumnit knea ampi vea . dau che neah chaur puok anak kaotakhlach a l laoh ning brate b tde tam khnhom
